## transcodeSmallest() function

Converts encoded text from its current encoding to the smallest representation supported by Core Foundation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function transcodeSmallest(text: BufferLike, fromEncoding: StringEncoding, options?: DecodeOptions & SelectAndEncodeOptions & {
    isEncodingOk?: never;
}): TextAndEncoding;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | <code>BufferLike</code> | The text to encode. |
|  fromEncoding | <code>StringEncoding</code> | The encoding of the text. |
|  options | <code>DecodeOptions &amp; SelectAndEncodeOptions &amp; {</code><br/><code>    isEncodingOk?: never;</code><br/><code>}</code> | Options for both decoding and encoding. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TextAndEncoding`

The encoded text and chosen encoding.

## Remarks

Throws [InvalidEncodedTextError](./iconv-corefoundation.invalidencodedtexterror.md) if the `text` is not valid in `fromEncoding`<!-- -->.
